 Having spent his life as a living study of doomed relationships, Maris is well aware of the courtship and fiasco that invariably follows. Still, there is something about Ture he canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t resist. Something that wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t let him walk away when he knows he should.
